flawed_nl_solution:
30 x 2/5 = <<30*2/5=12>>12 members ordered lemon juice.
So, 30 - 12 = <<30-12=18>>18 members did not order lemon juice.
Since 1/3 of the remaining ordered mango juice, then 18 x 1/3 = <<18*1/3=6>>6 members ordered mango juice.
Therefore, 18 - 6 = <<18-6=21>>21 members ordered orange juice.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 21. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
